  • 所有已知实现类:
    BaseModule, CoreModule, IntegrationModule, IntegrationSubModule, JustEnoughItemsModule, TheOneProbeModule, WorldGenModule

    • 方法详细资料

      • getDependencyUids

        default java.util.Set<net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation> getDependencyUids()
        What other modules this module depends on.

        For example, new ResourceLocation("gtlitecore", "module_name") represents a dependency on the module "module_name" in the container "gtlitecore".

      • construction

        default void construction(net.minecraftforge.fml.common.event.FMLConstructionEvent event)

      • preInit

        default void preInit(net.minecraftforge.fml.common.event.FMLPreInitializationEvent event)

      • init

        default void init(net.minecraftforge.fml.common.event.FMLInitializationEvent event)

        default void postInit(net.minecraftforge.fml.common.event.FMLPostInitializationEvent event)

      • registerPackets

        default void registerPackets()
        Register packets using packet handling API here.

      • getEventBusSubscribers

        @NotNull
default @NotNull java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> getEventBusSubscribers()
        The class itself gets subscribed, instead of a class instance, so event handlers must be static.
        返回:
        A list of classes to subscribe to the Forge Event Bus.

      • getTerrainGenBusSubscribers

        @NotNull
default @NotNull java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> getTerrainGenBusSubscribers()
        The class itself gets subscribed, instead of a class instance, so event handlers must be static.
        返回:
        A list of classes to subscribe to the Forge Terrain Gen Bus.

      • getOreGenBusSubscribers

        @NotNull
default @NotNull java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> getOreGenBusSubscribers()
        The class itself gets subscribed, instead of a class instance, so event handlers must be static.
        返回:
        A list of classes to subscribe to the Forge Ore Gen Bus.

      • processIMC

        default boolean processIMC(net.minecraftforge.fml.common.event.FMLInterModComms.IMCMessage message)
        参数:
        message - The message to process.
        返回:
        If the message was processed, stopping all other modules from processing it.

      • getLogger

        @NotNull
@NotNull org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger getLogger()
        返回:
        A logger to use for this module.
